Avpy Licenses
=============

Most files in Avpy are under the GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1
or later (LGPL v2.1+). 

Read the file COPYING.LGPLv2.1 for details.

However all files in the following folders are under the Apache License 2.0:
- tools
- examples

Read the file COPYING.Apache.v2.0 for details.

Links
-----

http://choosealicense.com/licenses/lgpl-2.1
http://choosealicense.com/licenses/apache-2.0
